objects.specification: A light-colored laminate floor with subtle wood grain texture, providing a bright and durable walking surface, with a smooth matte finish that reflects classroom lighting softly.
A smooth front wall painted in a soft pastel tone, with a flat matte finish that enhances brightness and provides a clean backdrop for mounted instructional elements.
A smooth back wall painted in a light neutral hue, featuring a matte finish ideal for displaying large educational maps and decorations.
A smooth left side wall with a neutral light background, providing a consistent surface for posters and display cases without glare.
A smooth right side wall painted in a bright neutral shade, perfect for mounting display cases and posters against a non-reflective backdrop.
A large teacher's desk crafted from smooth oak wood with a rich natural finish, featuring straight edges, sturdy metal legs in a warm brown tone, and a polished surface suitable for lesson materials.
A large rectangular matte blackboard with a deep dark green writing surface, framed by a thin oak wood border, designed to reduce glare and provide clear chalk contrast.
A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm natural finish, featuring three evenly spaced shelves filled with colorful dinosaur-themed book spines, and a simple straight-lined design.
A large educational world map printed on matte paper, illustrating prehistoric continents and dinosaur habitats in earthy greens, browns, and muted blues, framed by a thin wooden border.
A tall potted plant with lush green leaves cascading from a simple terracotta pot, adding a natural organic touch without obstructing pathways.
A realistic T-Rex statue with textured scaly skin in earthy green and brown hues, posed in a dynamic standing stance, with detailed claws and muscular contours.
A life-like Triceratops statue with rugged textured skin in muted brown and green tones, featuring prominent horns and frill, standing in a calm grazing pose.
A glass-topped display case with a polished wooden base, showcasing sculpted fossil bones arranged in authentic formation on a neutral fabric lining.
A glass-topped display case with a polished wooden base, showcasing sculpted fossil bones arranged in authentic formation on a neutral fabric lining.
A glass-topped display case with a polished wooden base, showcasing sculpted fossil bones arranged in authentic formation on a neutral fabric lining.
A rectangular student desk made of smooth natural oak wood with softly rounded edges, supported by slender metal legs in warm brown, featuring a matte finish.
A wooden student chair with a gently curved backrest and straight legs in a warm brown finish, ergonomically shaped for comfort.
A soft plush cushion with a dinosaur motif in green and brown earthy tones, featuring rounded corners and a subtle fabric texture.
